label.phrase: when rove speaks the political class pays attention usually with good reason

clusterList.phrase: when rove speaks the political class pays attention usually with good reason
the candidate who started out talking about high-minded civil debate has wholeheartedly adopted mr rove's low-minded and uncivil playbook
is engaging in the same old negative politics of karl rove
a repeat of the failed extremist politics that have characterized and plagued democratic party politics since the late 1960s

it wasn't too long ago that sen mccain and his campaign were talking about straight talk and civility and pledging to run a respectful campaign based solely on the issues sadly each and every day each and every hour they seem to take a turn in what the st pete times said today in an editorial that the straight talk express has taken a turn into the gutter it seems like we hit a new low note every day with this campaign
